H0.text: From air we obtain the minerals needed to make many things, including jewelry, chalk, and concrete.

H1.text: From wood is the source of the minerals used to make many things including jewelry, chalk, and concrete.

H2.text: Minerals needed for making jewelry, chalk, and concrete are obtained from rocks.

H3.text: Minerals needed to make jewelry, chalk, and concrete come from crops.

A4.text: Ore is natural rock or sediment that contains one or more valuable minerals, typically including metals, concentrated above background levels, and that is economically viable to mine and process.

A5.text: These are ore deposits which form as a direct result of metamorphism.
